name: Ankur Goyal
position: Investment Banking for Early Stage Startups

current_company.name: PepperTree
current_company.title: Investment Banking for Early Stage Startups

experience.title: Partner
experience.description: PepperTree Management Solutions is a management consulting outfit based out of Mumbai. We primarily focus on Early Stage Startups and SMEs for their fundraising and strategic requirements. The firm works closely with various leading VC Funds, Family Offices & Angel Investors to secure funds for quality startups from investors who add value from a strategic point of view.
experience.description_html: PepperTree Management Solutions is a management consulting outfit based out of Mumbai. We primarily focus on Early Stage Startups and SMEs for their fundraising and strategic requirements. The firm works closely with various leading VC Funds, Family Offices & Angel Investors to secure funds for quality startups from investors who add value from a strategic point of view. <!---->

experience.title: Partner - SlideStorie - Research Driven Pitchdeck, Financial Model & Industry Reports
experience.description: We have worked with Seed to Series C Startups for their Deck, Model & Secondary Research Requirements. We have also worked with several reputed VCs worldwide for their LP Pitch, Models etc. Our approach combines Research with a Great Design to effectively communicate the narrative.
